text: Asikho isono kunina uma nehlukanisa nabesifazane nibe ningakabathinti noma ningakabakhipheli lokho okuyisabelo sabo (Mehr). Futhi nibanike (isipho), koyisicebi okulingene namandla akhe futhi nokompofu okulingene namandla akhe isipho masenziwe ngendlela eyamukelekile, (lokho) kubekekile ukuba kwenziwe abenzi bokuhle
